sc.product_no, sc.std_product_no, sc.product_name, sc.product_price, sc.category_id, sc.category_no, sc.isvalidate, sc.approval_status, sc.channel, sc.brand_name, sc.brand_id, sc.unit_id, sc.min_uint, sc.product_pic, sc.ean13_code, sc.mnemonic_code, sc.invoice_type, sc.txt_code, sc.rule, sc.size, sc.create_user_id, sc.create_time, sc.edit_user_id, sc.edit_time, sc.udf1, sc.udf2, sc.udf3, sc.udf4, sc.udf5, sc.udf6, sc.udf7, sc.udf8, sc.udf9, sc.udf10, sc.suf1, sc.suf2, sc.suf3, sc.suf4, sc.suf5, sc.suf6, sc.suf7, sc.suf8, sc.suf9, sc.suf10, sc.request_id, sc.category_id_old, sc.create_user_id_old, sc.edit_user_id_old, sc.approval_status_old, sc.brand_id_old, sc.min_uint_old
mapper.select:
select
,upc.identifying_code ,customer.customer_no ,partner.supply_no ,ca.class_name from sku_core sc left join sku_upc upc on sc.product_no=upc.product_no left join category ca on sc.category_no=ca.class_code left join (select product_no,count(1) customer_no from sku_customer group by product_no) customer on sc.product_no=customer.product_no left join (select product_no,count(1) supply_no from sku_partner group by product_no) partner on sc.product_no=partner.product_no
order by sc.create_time desc

mapper.select: select max(substring(product_no,1,8)) as product_no,category_no from sku_core where category_no is not null group by category_no
